allSeriesCount.description: All series count under non deleted data feed

metricsCount.description: The metrics count under non deleted data feed

dataFeedCount.description: The count of non deleted data feed

period.description: point count used to look back, value range : [1, +)

minTopCount.description:
min count should be in top N, value range : [1, +)

should be less than or equal to period

lower.description:
lower bound

should be specified when direction is Both or Down

upper.description:
upper bound

should be specified when direction is Both or Up

type.description: data used to implement value filter

metricId.description: the other metric unique id used for value filter

triggerForMissing.description:
trigger alert when the corresponding point is missing in the other metric

should be specified only when using other metric to filter

crossMetricsOperator.description:
cross metrics operator

should be specified when setting up multiple metric alerting configurations

example.name: alerting configuration name
example.description: this is an anomaly alerting configuration

anomalyStatus.description:
anomaly status

only return for alerting anomaly result

expectedValue.description: expected value of the anomaly given by smart detector

dataFeedId.description:
data feed unique id

only return for alerting anomaly result

metricId.description:
metric unique id

only return for alerting anomaly result

anomalyDetectionConfigurationId.description:
anomaly detection configuration unique id

only return for alerting anomaly result

createdTime.description:
created time

only return for alerting result

modifiedTime.description:
modified time

only return for alerting result

maxSeverity.description: max severity of latest anomalies in the incident

incidentStatus.description:
incident status

only return for alerting incident result

expectedValueOfRootNode.description: expected value of the root node given by smart detector

dataFeedId.description:
data feed unique id

only return for alerting anomaly result

metricId.description:
metric unique id

only return for alerting incident result

anomalyDetectionConfigurationId.description:
anomaly detection configuration unique id

only return for alerting incident result

lowerBound.description:
lower bound

should be specified when anomalyDetectorDirection is Both or Down

upperBound.description:
upper bound

should be specified when anomalyDetectorDirection is Both or Up

withinRange.description:
if the withinRange = true, detected data is abnormal when the value falls in the range, in this case anomalyDetectorDirection must be Both
if the withinRange = false, detected data is abnormal when the value falls out of the range

conditionOperator.description:
condition operator

should be specified when combining multiple detection conditions

condition operator

should be specified when combining multiple detection conditions

condition operator

should be specified when combining multiple detection conditions

lowerBound.description:
lower bound

should be specified when anomalyDetectorDirection is Both or Down

upperBound.description:
upper bound

should be specified when anomalyDetectorDirection is Both or Up

withinRange.description:
if the withinRange = true, detected data is abnormal when the value falls in the range, in this case anomalyDetectorDirection must be Both
if the withinRange = false, detected data is abnormal when the value falls out of the range

conditionOperator.description:
condition operator

should be specified when combining multiple detection conditions

startTime.description: This is inclusive. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

endTime.description: This is exclusive. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

series.description: The series to be queried. The identity must be able to define one single time series instead of a group of time series. The maximum number of series is 100.

isAnomalyList.description: whether points of the series are anomalies

periodList.description: period calculated on each point of the series

expectedValueList.description: expected values of the series given by smart detector

lowerBoundaryList.description: lower boundary list of the series given by smart detector

upperBoundaryList.description: upper boundary list of the series given by smart detector

path.description: drilling down path from query anomaly to root cause

connectionString.description: The connection string to access the Azure SQL.

dataSourceCredentialId.description: Unique id of data source credential

example.dataSourceCredentialDescription: This is a data source credential

accountKey.description: The account key to access the Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

clientId.description: The client id of the service principal.

clientSecret.description: The client secret of the service principal.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the service principal.

keyVaultEndpoint.description: The Key Vault endpoint that storing the service principal.

keyVaultClientId.description: The Client Id to access the Key Vault.

keyVaultClientSecret.description: The Client Secret to access the Key Vault.

servicePrincipalIdNameInKV.description: The secret name of the service principal's client Id in the Key Vault.

servicePrincipalSecretNameInKV.description: The secret name of the service principal's client secret in the Key Vault.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of your service principal.

connectionString.description: The connection string to access the Azure SQL.

example.dataSourceCredentialDescription: This is a data source credential

accountKey.description: The account key to access the Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

clientId.description: The client id of the service principal.

clientSecret.description: The client secret of the service principal.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the service principal.

keyVaultEndpoint.description: The Key Vault endpoint that storing the service principal.

keyVaultClientId.description: The Client Id to access the Key Vault.

keyVaultClientSecret.description: The Client Secret to access the Key Vault.

servicePrincipalIdNameInKV.description: The secret name of the service principal's client Id in the Key Vault.

servicePrincipalSecretNameInKV.description: The secret name of the service principal's client secret in the Key Vault.

azureCloud.description: The Azure cloud that this Azure Application Insights in

applicationId.description: The application id of this Azure Application Insights

apiKey.description: The API Key that can access this Azure Application Insights

query.description: The statement to query this Azure Application Insights

granularityAmount.description: if granularity is custom,it is required.

timestampColumn.description: user-defined timestamp column. if timestampColumn is null, start time of every time slice will be used as default value.

startOffsetInSeconds.description: the time that the beginning of data ingestion task will delay for every data slice according to this offset.

maxConcurrency.description: the max concurrency of data ingestion queries against user data source. 0 means no limitation.

minRetryIntervalInSeconds.description: the min retry interval for failed data ingestion tasks.

stopRetryAfterInSeconds.description: stop retry data ingestion after the data slice first schedule time in seconds.

needRollup.description: mark if the data feed need rollup

allUpIdentification.description: the identification value for the row of calculated all-up value.

fillMissingPointType.description: the type of fill missing point for anomaly detection

fillMissingPointValue.description: the value of fill missing point for anomaly detection

viewMode.description: data feed access mode, default is Private

isAdmin.description: the query user is one of data feed administrator or not

authenticationType.description: authentication type for corresponding data source

example.dataFeedDescription: This is a sample data feed.

startTime.description: the start timestamp of feedback time range

endTime.description: the end timestamp of feedback time range, when equals to startTime means only one timestamp

anomalyDetectionConfigurationId.description: the corresponding anomaly detection configuration of this feedback

startTime.description: the start timestamp of feedback time range

endTime.description: the end timestamp of feedback time range, when equals to startTime means only one timestamp

startTime.description: the start timestamp of feedback time range

endTime.description: the end timestamp of feedback time range, when equals to startTime means only one timestamp

periodValue.description: the number of intervals a period contains, when no period set to 0

startTime.description: start time filter under chosen time mode

endTime.description: end time filter under chosen time mode

endpoint.description: API address, will be called when alert is triggered, only support POST method via SSL

username.description: (Deprecated) The username, if using basic authentication

password.description: (Deprecated) The password, if using basic authentication

certificateKey.description: The certificate key/URL, if using client certificate, please read documents for more informations.

certificatePassword.description: The certificate password, if using client certificate, please read documents for more informations.

endpoint.description: API address, will be called when alert is triggered, only support POST method via SSL

username.description: (Deprecated) The username, if using basic authentication

password.description: (Deprecated) The password, if using basic authentication

certificateKey.description: The certificate key, if using client certificate

certificatePassword.description: The certificate password, if using client certificate

startTime.description: the start point of time range to query data ingestion status.

endTime.description: the end point of time range to query data ingestion status.

status.description: latest ingestion task status for this data slice.

message.description: the trimmed message of last ingestion job.

startTime.description: the start point of time range to reset data ingestion status.

endTime.description: the end point of time range to reset data ingestion status.

latestSuccessTimestamp.description:
the timestamp of latest success ingestion job.
null indicates not available

latestActiveTimestamp.description:
the timestamp of latest ingestion job with status update.
null indicates not available

startTime.description: start time of query a time series data, and format should be yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

endTime.description: start time of query a time series data, and format should be yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

series.description: query specific series. The maximum number of series is 100.

timestampList.description: timestamps of the data related to this time series

valueList.description: values of the data related to this time series

activeSince.description: query series ingested after this time, the format should be yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ

dimensionFilter.description: filter specific dimension name and values

startTime.description: the start point of time range to query anomaly detection status.

endTime.description: the end point of time range to query anomaly detection status.

status.description: latest enrichment status for this data slice.

message.description: the trimmed message describes details of the enrichment status.

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://<resource-name>.cognitiveservices.azure.com).
